Sequence Information.Peptide Name: MaCTL (antimicrobial protein; natural AMPs; C-type lectin, Fish, animals, UCSS1)
Sequence Information.Source: spleen, muscle, liver, etc., blunt snout bream,Megalobrama amblycephala

Literature.Author: Liu Y, Wang Z, Wang W, Liu B, Li C, Sun Y, Cao J, Xia K, Yang M, Yan J. 2023
Literature.Title: Characterization and functional analysis of a novel C-type lectin in blunt snout bream (Megalobrama amblycephala).

Sequence Information.Comments: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals this sequence is most similar (28.72%) toRegIIIgammaMost similar to the CTL of grass carp (92.1%). GRAVY: -0.44; M Wt: 19302.051; Mol formula:  C871H1303N224O239S13; molar extinction coeff: 46800.Activity: inhibited the growth of E. coli, A. hydrophila, and S. aureus (based on OD600 change) at 20 ug/ml.
